statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerLifetimeValue;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM CustomerLifetimeValue;
SELECT * FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, product_purchased FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM CustomerLifetimeValue ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM CustomerLifetimeValue GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM CustomerLifetimeValue;
SELECT DISTINCT product_purchased FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY product_purchased ASC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM CustomerLifetimeValue WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, signup_date FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT c.name, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 100;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, cl.lifetime_value AS ltv FROM customers c JOIN customer_ltv cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE signup_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT customers.name, transactions.amount FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000 ORDER BY transactions.amount DESC

SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.name, SUM(transactions.amount) AS total_spent FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT customers.name, customer_ltv.lifetime_value FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_ltv ON customers.customer_id = customer_ltv.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, created_at FROM customers ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, activity_type FROM customers JOIN customer_activity ON customers.customer_id = customer_activity.customer_id ORDER BY customer_name ASC, activity_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, created_at FROM customers;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM customer_activity GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount < 50;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customer;
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Product ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM Transaction GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM Customer WHERE signup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE signup_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Product ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM Transaction GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT Customer.customer_name, SUM(Product.unit_price * Purchase.quantity) AS total_purchase_amount FROM Customer JOIN Purchase ON Customer.customer_id = Purchase.customer_id JOIN Product ON Purchase.product_id = Product.product_id GROUP BY Customer.customer_name ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
